summary: Comprehensive testing of EL-ANTIQ Hostel booking website completed. Backend APIs working perfectly (13/13 tests passed). Frontend functionality excellent with minor filtering issue. All core features including booking flow, admin dashboard, and mobile responsiveness working as expected.

ui_bugs.issue: When filtering by 'Available' status, shows 0 rooms instead of available rooms
ui_bugs.details: Filter logic may not be matching the correct availability status values

passed_tests: API Health Check - All 13 backend endpoints working
Homepage - Hero section, features, universities, CTA buttons
Rooms Page - 5 rooms displayed with correct availability badges
Room Type Filter - 1-in-1 and 2-in-1 filtering works
Room Details - Gallery with thumbnails, navigation, amenities
Booking Form - Form validation, school selection, date picker
Contact Page - Form submission, contact info, Google Maps
Admin Login - Successful authentication with admin@elantiq.com
Admin Dashboard - All tabs, stats, booking management
Mobile Responsiveness - Excellent on all screen sizes
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix room availability filter logic in RoomsPage.jsx - when filtering by 'Available' status, ensure it matches the correct availability_status values from the API (should show rooms with status 'available')
